messages.title: Want to change Britain's Future?
messages.content: The Lib Dems are fighting to get the best for Britain, staying in the single market, protecting jobs and fighting for an open and tolerant society. The party offers a chance to have the final say on Brexit deal.

messages.title: The only party with a real plan to save our NHS
messages.content: The Lib Dems propose investing an extra £6bn a year to save our NHS funded by a 1p rise in income tax.

messages.title: Millions are demanding change
messages.content: Liberal Democrats are presented as the choice for changing Britain's future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest an extra £6bn a year to save the NHS, funded by a 1p rise in income tax.
Stop a damaging Brexit and ensure vital services like the NHS and schools are protected. Offer a final say on the Brexit deal.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The leaflet suggests tactical voting by indicating that Labour's approach to Brexit makes the Lib Dems the real opposition to the Conservatives.

issues.brexitEurope: The Lib Dems are anti-Brexit, want to stay in the single market and offer a final say on the Brexit deal.
issues.health: The Lib Dems propose investing an extra £6bn a year to save the NHS, funded by a 1p rise in income tax.

leaflet.personalStatement: Julian Huppert is deeply concerned about the direction the country is heading under the current Conservative government, stating that if re-elected on June 8th, he will fight day in, day out to stop a damaging Brexit and severe cuts.

contactInformation.address: 15 Ronald Rolph Court, Wadloes Road, Cambridge CB5 8PX

endorsements.endorsement: Only the Lib Dems can stop hard Brexit.

quotes.text: Lib Dems are the anti-Brexit, reforming party. So for all those Remain voters still unreconciled to the outcome of the referendum, the only obvious choice is Lib Dem.
Labour voted with UKIP and Tories for Brexit.
Jeremy Corbyn's Labour voted with UKIP in Parliament to support a hard Brexit.
